meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to shine See also 射す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be visible

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be tinged with ほお紅や口紅を差すだけで表情や笑顔がどんどん変わってくるんです。Expressions and smiles change like that just from applying rouge and lipstick.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to rise (of water levels); to flow in

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to be felt (i.e. as an emotion); to come over one See also 気が差す, See also 魔が差す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to hold up (an umbrella, etc.); to put up; to raise 彼は雨の中を傘もささずに歩きつづけた。He went on walking in the rain without an umbrella.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to extend one's arm straight ahead (in dance) See also 指す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to insert; to put in See also 挿す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to wear (a sword) in one's belt; to wear at one's side; to carry under one's arm See also 挿す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to insert one's arm under an opponent's arm Sumo

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to pole (a boat) See also 刺す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to pour; to add (liquid); to serve (drinks) See also 注す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to put on (lipstick, etc.); to apply; to colour; to dye See also 点す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to light (a fire); to burn See also 点す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to shut; to close; to lock; to fasten See also 鎖す
16. to stop in the midst of; to leave undone See also 止す, after the -masu stem of a verb

差違 【さい】
1. difference; disparity; gap
2. Difference (philosophy) Difference is a key concept of continental philosophy, de... Read more
差違 【さい】
1. to lift up; to hold up; to raise 彼はトロフィーを高々と差し上げた。He held the trophy up high.
2. to give; to present; to offer Humble (kenjougo) language飲み物を差し上げましょうか。May I offer you a drink?
3. to do (for someone) Humble (kenjougo) language, after -te form of verb; more respectful than 〜して上げる
差上げる 【さしあげる】
1. to lift up; to hold up; to raise 彼はトロフィーを高々と差し上げた。He held the trophy up high.
2. to give; to present; to offer Humble (kenjougo) language飲み物を差し上げましょうか。May I offer you a drink?
3. to do (for someone) Humble (kenjougo) language, after -te form of verb; more respectful than 〜して上げる
差上げる 【さしあげる】

sentences.translation: He held the trophy up high.
May I offer you a drink?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to come near (to); to approach 私達が峠にさしかかる頃に雨になった。It began to rain as we came near the pass.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be on the verge of; to be about to reach (a stage, period, etc.); to approach (e.g. a climax) 交渉はとても微妙な段階にさしかかっている。The negotiations are at a very delicate stage.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to overhang; to hang over
差しかかる 【さしかかる】、差し掛る 【さしかかる】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to come near (to); to approach 私達が峠にさしかかる頃に雨になった。It began to rain as we came near the pass.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be on the verge of; to be about to reach (a stage, period, etc.); to approach (e.g. a climax) 交渉はとても微妙な段階にさしかかっている。The negotiations are at a very delicate stage.

The negotiations are at a very delicate stage.

差引く 【さしひく】
1. for the time being; at present Usually written using kana alone, See also 差し当たって
2. hindrance Archaic, See also 差し障り
差当り 【さしあたり】、さし当たり 【さしあたり】、差しあたり 【さしあたり】、差当たり 【さしあたり】
1. to hold out; to extend (e.g. one's hands); to stretch; to reach out for
2. to thrust (javelin)
3. to offer (e.g. aid, help, etc.) See also 手を差し伸べる私が出来る限りの援助を彼に差しのべるつもりです。I'll offer him what help I can.
差し延べる 【さしのべる】、差伸べる 【さしのべる】、差延べる 【さしのべる】

sentences.translation: I'll offer him what help I can.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to insert; to put in; to thrust in; to plug in See also 挿し込む さしこむしかもなお、石の大きいブロックが非常にぴったりと合わさっているので、ブロックの間にナイフの先を差し込むことができない。And yet the large blocks of stone are fitted together so closely that you cannot put in the point of a knife between them.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to have a griping pain

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to flow in; to shine in See also 射し込むこんもりと茂った木々の葉を通して日光が差し込んだ。The sunshine penetrated the thick leaves of the trees.
差込む 【さしこむ】、差しこむ 【さしこむ】

sentences.translation: And yet the large blocks of stone are fitted together so closely that you cannot put in the point of a knife between them.
The sunshine penetrated the thick leaves of the trees.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to insert

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to interrupt; to slip in a word 「ええ、そうね」とスーザンが言葉をさしはさむ。「私が電話したのは・・・」"Ah, that's true," Susan puts in, "I just wanted to call to ..."

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb

sentences.translation: "Ah, that's true," Susan puts in, "I just wanted to call to ..."
That leaves no room for doubt.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to aim at (for, to do, to become); to try for; to have an eye on 教育はテストに合格することを目指すべきでない。Education shouldn't be aimed at passing a test.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to go toward; to head for アメリカ人はみんな、成功の機会のある北部を目指している。Americans are all heading north to the land of opportunity.
目差す 【めざす】、目ざす 【めざす】

sentences.translation: Education shouldn't be aimed at passing a test.
Americans are all heading north to the land of opportunity.
